Package utility.field.projectiles

Class Projectile

java.lang.Object
utility.field.FieldObject
utility.field.projectiles.Projectile
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bullet, Missile
public abstract class Projectile
extends FieldObject
The Projectile class is a parent class used for different type of weapons

  • Constructor Details

    • Projectile

      public Projectile​(float x, float y, float velocity, float damage, float range, float angle, java.lang.String source)
      constrctor which creates a new projectile.
      Parameters:
      x - current map position.
      y - current map position.
      velocity - speed of Projectile
      damage - damage of Projectile
      range - range of Projectile
      angle - angle of Projectile
      source - describes what object shot the Projectile

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(DrawingSurface surface, float adjustedX, float adjustedY)
      Description copied from class: FieldObject
      method to draw the specific FieldObject. this will use adjusted values, since the DrawingSurface view is different from appearance due to map structure.
      Overrides:
      draw in class FieldObject
      Parameters:
      surface - game window
      adjustedX - view adjusted x
      adjustedY - view adjusted y
